Package controller

Class UpdateCustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.UpdateCustomerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonUseHelperIfc, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class UpdateCustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, CommonUseHelperIfc
    This class provides a data control flow between the update a customer UI and database tables

      • areValidInputs

        private boolean areValidInputs​(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String address,
                               java.lang.String phone,
                               java.lang.String postCode)
        This method validates the user input
        Parameters:
        name - the user name can only be alphabets with space between
        address - the user address can not contain special characters
        phone - the user phone can not contain special characters
        postCode - the user post code can not contain special characters
        Returns:
        true if all inputs are valid, otherwise returns a false
